name: ArXiVforAlexa
0:
”Alexa, ask pre print archive to Get me the recent papers in computational finance”
”get recent papers in quantum gases”
”recent papers in combinatorics”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pre print archive
des: This skill selects the 20 most recent papers from ArXiv.org, from a category of your choosing, and reads them to you. You can choose to listen to an abstract or just breeze through the titles. If you're interested in science and the most recent developments in your field, this app is for you
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
